doc:
Gaston Glass https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaston_Glass 0 Gaston Glass (December 31, 1899 – November 11, 1965) was a French-born American actor and producer. He was born Jacques Gaston Oscar Glass in Paris and died in Santa Monica, California. He was the father of the composer Paul Glass (born in 1934). Gaston_Glass ( December_31_,_1899 – November_11_,_1965 ) was a_French-born_American_actor_and_producer . He was_born Jacques_Gaston_Oscar_Glass in Paris and died in Santa_Monica , California . He was the_father of the_composer_Paul_Glass_( born in 1934_) .
